quote: “Part of the journey is the end.”

name: Tony Stark
quote: “No amount of money ever bought a second of time.”

name: Steve Rogers
quote: “You know, I keep telling everybody they should move on and grow. Some do. But not us.”

quote: “No mistakes. No do-overs. Look out for each other. This is the fight of our lives.”

name: Thanos
quote: “The only matter I do not take seriously, boy, is you. Your politics bore me! Your demeanor is that of a pouting child. And, apparently, you alienated my favorite daughter, Gamora. I shall honor our agreement, Kree, if you bring me the Orb. But return to me again empty-handed, and I will bathe the star-ways with your blood.”

name: Rocket Raccoon
